allProducts.description: Seamlessly blending conventional and microwave heating technologies, the Hybrid Model offers adaptive solutions for diverse thermal processing needs.

Title1.value: Three phase / AC /230V (32A MCCB with neutral to be arranged)

overViewDescription: VBCC's Hybrid Microwave Furnace stands as a pioneering solution, seamlessly merging conventional and microwave heating technologies to offer unmatched versatility in thermal processing. This innovative furnace is designed for applications that demand adaptive and dynamic heating methods, providing users with the flexibility to choose between conventional and microwave heating based on specific process requirements.

The Hybrid model inherits the precision and reliability of microwave heating while introducing the adaptability of conventional methods. This unique combination empowers users to tailor the heating approach to different stages or characteristics of their processes, optimizing overall efficiency.

Engineered for diverse thermal processing needs, the Hybrid Microwave Furnace is a sophisticated solution for researchers and industries requiring the best of both heating technologies. With a robust construction and advanced features, it exemplifies VBCC's commitment to providing cutting-edge solutions that adapt to the evolving demands of thermal processing applications. The Hybrid Microwave Furnace signifies a new era of flexibility, efficiency, and precision in thermal operations, where innovation meets adaptability for optimal performance.

overViewDescription: VBCC's Microwave Furnace Super Model serves as the foundational cornerstone in the lineup of advanced thermal processing solutions. As the basic starting model, it lays the groundwork for efficient and reliable large-scale thermal operations. Built upon the efficacy of microwave heating, the Super Model introduces users to a world of versatile possibilities for extensive applications.

Designed with a substantial working volume, the Super Model is adept at addressing tasks requiring higher capacities, providing users with a reliable entry point into the realm of thermal processing. While serving as the foundational model, it inherits the innovative features and robust construction synonymous with VBCC's commitment to cutting-edge technology.

The Microwave Furnace Super Model, though the starting point, is far from basic in performance. It signifies VBCC's dedication to offering an accessible yet powerful solution, setting the stage for advancements in thermal processing technology. With its foundational capabilities, the Super Model is an invitation to explore the potential of efficient, large-scale thermal operations within a versatile and reliable framework.

overViewDescription: VBCC's Microwave Furnace Premium Model epitomizes the next tier in advanced thermal processing, surpassing the foundational Super Model with added insulation technology for superior efficiency. Designed with a focus on precision, this model introduces cutting-edge insulation features, setting it as a tier higher for applications demanding uncompromised thermal performance.

The Premium Model seamlessly integrates microwave energy with state-of-the-art insulation, ensuring superior and uniform heating across diverse high-temperature processes. Its advanced insulation technology not only enhances efficiency but also provides a level of thermal control that goes beyond the capabilities of the Super Model.

Engineered for reliability and precision, the Microwave Furnace Premium Model inherits the innovative features of its predecessor while introducing a higher standard of thermal efficiency. With a robust construction and the added advantage of advanced insulation, it caters to applications that demand precision and reliability in every thermal processing task. VBCC's commitment to technological excellence is evident in the Premium Model, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a tier higher in performance and thermal control.

overViewDescription: VBCC's Microwave Furnace Big Model introduces a new dimension to large-scale thermal processing, offering an expansive working volume and formidable capabilities. Built upon the efficiency of microwave heating, this model is purposefully designed for substantial tasks that demand higher capacities, making it the ultimate solution for extensive thermal operations.

With a substantial increase in working volume, the Big Model caters to the unique requirements of large-scale applications, providing users with an efficient and reliable tool for processing higher quantities. Its robust construction and advanced features align seamlessly with VBCC's commitment to cutting-edge solutions, ensuring uncompromised efficiency and performance.

The Microwave Furnace Big Model stands as a testament to VBCC's dedication to advancing technology in thermal processing for extensive applications. It combines the innovation of microwave heating with an enlarged capacity, offering users an unparalleled solution for tackling the challenges of large-scale thermal operations with precision and reliability. The Big Model signifies a new era in thermal processing, where efficiency, adaptability, and expansive capabilities converge for optimal performance.

overViewDescription: VBCC's Microwave Furnace Computerized Model redefines precision and control in thermal processing applications. This advanced furnace integrates cutting-edge computerized technology, providing users with unparalleled automation and programmability for precise temperature and heating control.

Designed for efficiency and ease of use, the Computerized Model allows users to program and monitor the entire thermal process with accuracy. The integration of computerized controls ensures consistent and repeatable results, making it an ideal solution for applications demanding high precision and reproducibility.

With a user-friendly interface, the Computerized Model simplifies the complexities of thermal processing, offering features such as programmable heating profiles, real-time monitoring, and automated data logging. This level of automation not only enhances operational efficiency but also allows researchers and industries to achieve a new level of control over their thermal processes.

VBCC's Microwave Furnace Computerized Model stands as a testament to the company's commitment to technological innovation. It combines the benefits of microwave heating with advanced computerized controls, providing users with a state-of-the-art solution that transforms the landscape of precision thermal processing.

allProducts.description: Integrating microwave heating with stir casting, this furnace facilitates uniform distribution of particles in molten matrices, enhancing material synthesis.

title: General
Temperature
Size

Title1.name: Electrical Requirements
Title1.value: Three phase / AC /230V (32A MCCB with neutral to be arranged)

overViewDescription: VBCC's Microwave-Assisted Stir Casting Furnace represents a technological breakthrough in the field of material processing. This innovative furnace seamlessly integrates the efficiency of microwave heating with the stirring capabilities of stir casting, offering a versatile solution for alloy and composite material synthesis.

Designed for precision and control, the furnace employs microwave energy to enhance the heating process, ensuring uniform and rapid heating of the material. The addition of stir casting functionality allows for the homogenous distribution of particles within the molten matrix, resulting in superior material properties.

The Microwave-Assisted Stir Casting Furnace is an ideal choice for researchers and industries engaged in the development of advanced materials. It facilitates the production of high-quality alloys and composites with improved mechanical properties. The integration of microwave assistance and stirring capabilities sets this furnace apart, providing users with a powerful tool for the synthesis of complex materials with enhanced structural characteristics.

VBCC's commitment to technological excellence is evident in the Microwave-Assisted Stir Casting Furnace, offering a cutting-edge solution for those seeking precision, efficiency, and versatility in the synthesis of advanced materials.

allProducts.description: Revolutionizing chemical synthesis, this unit harnesses microwave energy for accelerated reactions, offering precise control and enhanced efficiency.

overViewDescription: VBCC's Microwave-Assisted Chemical Processing Unit revolutionizes chemical synthesis with its innovative design and advanced technology. This unit seamlessly integrates the efficiency of microwave heating into chemical processing, providing researchers and industries with a powerful tool for precise and accelerated chemical reactions.

Designed for versatility and control, the unit harnesses microwave energy to facilitate rapid and uniform heating of chemical reactions. This results in shortened reaction times and improved yield, making it an ideal solution for processes requiring enhanced efficiency.

The Microwave-Assisted Chemical Processing Unit is equipped with user-friendly controls, allowing for programmable heating profiles and real-time monitoring. This level of automation enhances reproducibility and precision in chemical reactions, making it an invaluable asset for laboratories and industries engaged in chemical synthesis and process optimization.

VBCC's commitment to technological innovation is evident in this unit, which not only accelerates chemical processes but also opens avenues for more sustainable and efficient chemical synthesis. The Microwave-Assisted Chemical Processing Unit stands as a testament to VBCC's dedication to advancing technology in the realm of chemical processing.

allProducts.description: A high-tech solution for organic material degradation, this reactor utilizes microwave energy to induce pyrolysis, producing valuable byproducts like biochar and bio-oil.

allProducts.description: Offering controlled thermal processing up to 1200°C, this tubular furnace is a reliable solution for applications like annealing and materials research

title: General
Temperature
Size

Title1.value: Single phase / AC (32A MCB with neutral to be arranged)

Title2.name: Insulation
Title2.value: Zirconia Blend Ceramic Fiber - MMTCL make

overViewDescription: VBCC's Tubular Furnace, designed for a maximum temperature of 1200°C, excels not only in its versatile thermal processing capabilities but also in its adaptability to different atmospheres. This furnace is engineered to operate seamlessly in both inert and vacuum environments, expanding its utility and providing precise control over the processing conditions.

In an inert atmosphere, such as nitrogen or argon, the tubular furnace ensures a controlled, oxygen-free environment. This is crucial for processes where the presence of oxygen may interfere with material reactions or cause unwanted oxidation. The furnace's tubular design promotes uniform heat distribution along the sample, making it ideal for applications requiring precise thermal control in inert conditions.

Additionally, the Tubular Furnace is well-equipped to operate under vacuum conditions. This capability is essential for processes requiring a low-pressure environment, such as materials synthesis or the removal of volatile components. The furnace's adaptability to vacuum conditions ensures optimal performance in a variety of thermal processing applications.

The combination of inert atmosphere and vacuum capabilities makes VBCC's Tubular Furnace a reliable and versatile solution for researchers and industries seeking precise, controlled, and adaptable thermal processing in diverse controlled environments.

Title2.name: Insulation

overViewDescription: VBCC's Tubular Furnace with a maximum temperature of 1400°C is a cutting-edge solution for high-temperature thermal processing. Designed for precision and versatility, this furnace provides a cylindrical heating chamber suitable for a wide range of applications such as sintering, annealing, and advanced materials research.

With its remarkable capability to reach temperatures up to 1400°C, this tubular furnace is ideal for processes demanding elevated temperatures. The tubular design ensures uniform heat distribution along the sample, promoting consistent and reliable results.

Notably, the Tubular Furnace is engineered to operate in both inert atmospheres and under vacuum conditions. In an inert atmosphere, it provides a controlled, oxygen-free environment crucial for processes where the presence of oxygen may interfere with material reactions or cause unwanted oxidation. Its adaptability to vacuum conditions is essential for processes requiring a low-pressure environment.

User-friendly controls enable easy temperature adjustments and programmable heating profiles, enhancing flexibility for different thermal processing needs. The compact and robust construction of the Tubular Furnace makes it a dependable and efficient tool for research laboratories and industrial settings, offering precise and controlled high-temperature thermal processing in diverse environments.

overViewDescription: VBCC's Tubular Furnace, with a temperature capacity of up to 1600°C, not only excels in high-temperature thermal processing but also offers versatile capabilities in controlled atmospheres. This furnace is adept at operating in both vacuum and inert atmospheres, extending its utility for a wide range of applications.

In a vacuum atmosphere, the furnace creates a low-pressure environment, vital for processes requiring the absence of reactive gases. This capability is especially beneficial for materials synthesis, heat treatment, and other applications where precise control over the environment is crucial.

Additionally, the Tubular Furnace is engineered to operate in inert atmospheres, such as nitrogen or argon. This feature is essential for processes where the presence of oxygen may lead to oxidation or undesired reactions. The controlled inert atmosphere ensures the purity of the thermal processing environment, making it suitable for applications demanding precise control.

The tubular design further enhances these capabilities, promoting uniform heat distribution along samples. With user-friendly controls facilitating adjustments for vacuum or inert conditions, VBCC's Tubular Furnace up to 1600°C becomes a versatile tool, providing researchers and industries with a reliable platform for controlled and high-temperature thermal processing in diverse environments.

overViewDescription: VBCC's Tubular Furnace, capable of reaching temperatures up to 1800°C, offers a versatile and controlled thermal environment essential for diverse high-temperature applications. What sets this furnace apart is its capability to operate in both inert atmospheres and vacuum conditions, expanding its utility across various research and industrial scenarios.

overViewList.title: Inert Atmosphere Capability:
overViewList.para: The furnace is equipped to operate in inert atmospheres such as argon or nitrogen, shielding sensitive materials from oxidation or other undesired reactions during high-temperature processes. This capability is pivotal in applications like sintering and annealing, where maintaining a controlled atmosphere is crucial for material quality and properties.

overViewList.title: Vacuum Processing:
overViewList.para: For processes demanding oxygen-free environments, the Tubular Furnace's vacuum capability becomes invaluable. By creating a vacuum, the furnace eliminates oxygen and other reactive gases, enabling researchers and industry professionals to conduct experiments requiring precise control over the material's exposure to external elements.

specification.overViewLastPara: Whether under inert gas or vacuum, the Tubular Furnace ensures uniform heat distribution and precise temperature control, providing researchers and industrial users with a reliable and adaptable platform for high-temperature research, development, and production processes. The furnace's dual capability underscores VBCC's commitment to offering advanced solutions that cater to the diverse needs of materials scientists and engineers across different fields.

allProducts.description: VBCC's tiltable tubular furnace offers precise thermal processing with a dynamic design, allowing optimal control over the heating environment.

Title2.value: Zirconia Blend Ceramic Fiber - MMTCL make

overViewDescription: VBCC's Tiltable Tubular Furnace stands as a pinnacle of innovation in thermal processing, offering a dynamic and adaptable solution for a myriad of applications. The furnace's distinctive feature lies in its tilting design, empowering users with unparalleled control and flexibility. This tiltable functionality holds the key to optimized material processing. Researchers and industries can precisely adjust the angle of the heating tube, ensuring uniform exposure to heat and promoting enhanced reaction kinetics. The furnace's versatility shines during experimentation, accommodating diverse sample configurations and allowing for exploration across various heating profiles.

Customizable angle control is a hallmark of this furnace, enabling users to tailor the tilt angle to specific process requirements. Whether it's achieving targeted outcomes or ensuring uniform heating across samples, the tilting feature provides a level of control that is indispensable in thermal processing. Additionally, the furnace is designed to operate seamlessly in inert atmospheres, such as nitrogen or argon, and under vacuum conditions. This expands its utility, allowing precise control over the processing environment, crucial for processes where the presence of oxygen may interfere or in low-pressure environments. The combination of tiltable design with inert atmosphere and vacuum capabilities makes the Tiltable Tubular Furnace from VBCC a reliable, cutting-edge, and versatile solution for those seeking precise, adaptable, and efficient thermal processing capabilities in controlled environments.

overViewDescription: VBCC's Rotary Tubular Furnace with a maximum temperature of up to 1800°C stands as a cutting-edge solution for advanced thermal processing. Engineered for precision and adaptability, this furnace introduces a rotating mechanism to the traditional tubular design, providing enhanced mixing and exposure for the processed materials.

With an impressive temperature capability of up to 1800°C, this rotary tubular furnace is ideal for applications requiring high-temperature treatments such as sintering, calcination, and materials synthesis. The rotating feature ensures uniform heat distribution, promoting consistent and reliable results across samples.

The rotary mechanism adds a dynamic element to the thermal processing, facilitating improved mixing and exposure of the materials to the heat source. This feature is particularly advantageous for processes where homogeneous treatment is essential for desired material properties.

User-friendly controls enable easy adjustments and programmable heating profiles, enhancing flexibility for different thermal processing needs. The robust construction of the Rotary Tubular Furnace up to 1800°C makes it a dependable and efficient tool for research laboratories and industrial settings, offering precise and controlled high-temperature thermal processing with the added benefit of rotation for enhanced material treatment.

overViewDescription: VBCC's Ageing Tubular Furnace is a specialized thermal processing solution meticulously crafted for precise and controlled ageing or heat treatment of materials. Tailored to meet the demands of materials science, metallurgy, and industrial applications, this furnace exemplifies cutting-edge technology and reliability.
Key Features:

overViewList.title: 1. Temperature Precision:
overViewList.para: The Ageing Tubular Furnace from VBCC ensures precise temperature control throughout the ageing process. This feature is paramount for achieving targeted material properties and performance enhancements.

overViewList.title: 2. Uniform Heat Distribution:
overViewList.para: With its tubular design, the furnace promotes uniform heat distribution, preventing temperature variations that could impact the consistency of the ageing outcomes. This ensures reliable and reproducible results.

overViewList.title: 3. Customizable Duration:
overViewList.para: Recognizing the importance of specific ageing durations, VBCC's furnace provides controls for tailoring the duration of the ageing cycle to meet the unique requirements of different materials and applications.

overViewList.title: 4. Safety Measures:
overViewList.para: The furnace incorporates robust safety features, including temperature alarms and emergency shutdown protocols. These measures prioritize operator safety and protect the furnace during operation.

specification.overViewLastPara: VBCC's Ageing Tubular Furnace stands as a testament to the company's commitment to providing advanced and reliable thermal processing solutions. Whether in research laboratories or industrial settings, this furnace is designed to meet the stringent demands of controlled ageing processes, contributing to advancements in materials science and industrial applications.

allProducts.description: Tailored for studying hot corrosion effects, this tubular furnace simulates high-temperature corrosive environments, contributing to advancements in materials science and corrosion-resistant materials

title: General
Temperature
Size

Title1.name: Electrical Requirements
Title1.value: Two phase / AC (32A MCB with neutral to be arranged)

Title2.name: Insulation
Title2.value: Zirconia Blend Ceramic Fiber - MMTCL make

Title3.name: Tubular material
Title3.value: Impervious Fused Recrystalised Alumina Suitable up to 1800°C

overViewDescription: VBCC's Hot Corrosion Tubular Furnace represents a state-of-the-art solution for studying the intricate effects of hot corrosion on materials in high-temperature environments. Meticulously designed to meet the specific demands of corrosion research, this furnace exemplifies VBCC's commitment to cutting-edge thermal processing solutions.
Key Features:

overViewList.title: 1. Elevated Temperature Capability:
overViewList.para: Engineered to reach and sustain elevated temperatures, the Hot Corrosion Tubular Furnace from VBCC accurately replicates conditions conducive to hot corrosion phenomena.

overViewList.title: 2. Simulated Corrosive Atmosphere:
overViewList.para: The furnace is configured to introduce specific corrosive agents or gases into the chamber, closely mimicking the corrosive environment encountered in real-world industrial applications.

overViewList.title: 3. Precise Control Over Conditions:
overViewList.para: VBCC's furnace offers meticulous control over temperature, gas composition, and other parameters, ensuring researchers can create reproducible conditions for in-depth studies of hot corrosion effects.

overViewList.title: 4. Uniform Heat Distribution:
overViewList.para: The tubular design guarantees uniform heat distribution along the samples, contributing to reliable and consistent results in the study of materials' response to hot corrosion.

overViewList.title: 5. Versatile Sample Compatibility:
overViewList.para: Recognizing the diverse nature of research requirements, the furnace is configured to accommodate various sample sizes and configurations, enhancing its versatility.

overViewList.title: 6. Monitoring and Analysis Capabilities:
overViewList.para: Equipped with monitoring systems, the furnace allows researchers to observe the corrosion process in real-time and analyze the impact on materials, facilitating a comprehensive understanding of material behavior.

specification.overViewLastPara: VBCC's Hot Corrosion Tubular Furnace stands as an invaluable tool for advancing corrosion research, contributing to the development of corrosion-resistant materials and coatings for industries operating in challenging high-temperature environments.

overViewDescription: VBCC's Box Type Vacuum Furnace with a maximum temperature of 1200°C is a sophisticated thermal processing solution designed for controlled environments. Engineered for precision and adaptability, this furnace offers a vacuum atmosphere, making it suitable for processes requiring a low-pressure environment, such as sintering, brazing, and heat treatment.

With its temperature capability of up to 1200°C, the Box Type Vacuum Furnace provides researchers and industries with a versatile platform for high-temperature applications. The vacuum atmosphere ensures the absence of reactive gases, preventing unwanted reactions and ensuring the purity of the thermal processing environment.

The box-type design allows for a spacious chamber, accommodating various sample sizes and configurations. User-friendly controls facilitate precise adjustments and programmable heating profiles, offering flexibility for different thermal processing needs. The robust construction of the furnace ensures durability and consistent performance in vacuum conditions.

Whether used in research laboratories or industrial settings, VBCC's Box Type Vacuum Furnace at 1200°C stands as a reliable and efficient tool for achieving precise and controlled high-temperature thermal processing in a vacuum atmosphere.

overViewDescription: VBCC's Thermal Cycling Furnace with a maximum temperature of up to 1800°C is a sophisticated solution designed for controlled temperature cycling in thermal processing. Engineered for precision and reliability, this furnace is ideal for applications requiring repeated temperature variations, such as thermal fatigue testing, materials characterization, and advanced research.

With its remarkable temperature capability, the Thermal Cycling Furnace up to 1800°C provides a versatile platform for studying materials' responses to varying temperature conditions. The controlled cycling feature is crucial for simulating real-world scenarios and understanding the thermal behavior of materials under dynamic conditions.

User-friendly controls facilitate precise adjustments and programmable temperature cycling profiles, offering flexibility for different thermal processing needs. The robust construction ensures durability and consistent performance throughout extended cycling operations.

Whether for research laboratories or industrial applications, VBCC's Thermal Cycling Furnace up to 1800°C stands as a dependable and efficient tool for exploring the effects of temperature variations on materials, contributing to advancements in material science and thermal analysis.

overViewDescription: A Two/Three Zone Furnace with a maximum temperature of up to 1800°C from VBCC represents an advanced thermal processing solution. Engineered for precision and versatility, this furnace is designed to create distinct temperature zones within the heating chamber, allowing for tailored and controlled thermal profiles.

With a remarkable temperature capability of up to 1800°C, this multi-zone furnace is well-suited for diverse applications such as materials synthesis, heat treatment, and advanced research where precise temperature control across different zones is critical.

The two/three-zone configuration enables users to create specific temperature gradients along the sample, enhancing the flexibility and adaptability of the furnace for complex thermal processes. Whether it's sintering, annealing, or advanced materials testing, the multi-zone design ensures uniform heat distribution and consistent results.

User-friendly controls facilitate easy adjustments and programmable heating profiles for each zone, providing a high degree of flexibility in thermal processing. The robust construction of the Two/Three Zone Furnace up to 1800°C makes it a dependable and efficient tool for research laboratories and industrial settings, offering precise and controlled thermal processing across multiple zones.

allProducts.description: VBCC's Fire Side Corrosion Simulator Furnace replicates industrial fire side conditions, allowing in-depth studies on materials' responses to high temperatures, corrosive gases, and ash deposition

Title1.value: Three phase / AC /230V (32A MCCB with neutral to be arranged)

Title1.value: Imported RCA Tube from Haliden Wanger Germany

overViewDescription: VBCC's Fire Side Corrosion Simulator Furnace represents a cutting-edge solution tailored for studying the complex phenomenon of fire side corrosion in industrial settings, particularly in power plants and combustion systems. This specialized furnace is meticulously designed to replicate the harsh conditions encountered in the fire side, where materials are subjected to high temperatures, corrosive gases, and ash deposition.
Key Features:

overViewList.title: 1. High-Temperature Operation:
overViewList.para: Engineered to reach and maintain elevated temperatures, VBCC's simulator ensures an accurate representation of the intense heat experienced in fire side environments.

overViewList.title: 2. Corrosive Atmosphere Simulation:
overViewList.para: The furnace is configured to introduce specific corrosive agents and gases, including sulfur compounds, to authentically simulate the corrosive environment encountered in combustion systems.

overViewList.title: 3. Ash Deposition Replication:
overViewList.para: The simulator includes provisions for introducing ash or particulate matter, mirroring the ash deposition that occurs in real-world industrial scenarios.

overViewList.title: 4. Controlled Conditions:
overViewList.para: Precise control over temperature, gas composition, and other parameters enables researchers to create reproducible conditions for in-depth studies of fire side corrosion effects.

overViewList.title: 5. Material Compatibility:
overViewList.para: Constructed with materials compatible with corrosive environments, VBCC's simulator ensures realistic simulations without compromising the integrity of the equipment.

specification.overViewLastPara: The VBCC Fire Side Corrosion Simulator Furnace stands as a pivotal tool for advancing research in materials science and corrosion-resistant materials. By faithfully replicating the challenging conditions of fire side environments, this furnace contributes to the development of materials capable of withstanding the harsh realities of industrial combustion systems.

overViewList.para: The vacuum oven is equipped with advanced controls, allowing users to achieve and maintain precise vacuum levels within the chamber. This feature is crucial for processes such as drying, degassing, and heat treatment.

overViewList.para: Designed for uniform temperature distribution, the oven ensures consistent results across the entire chamber. This is essential for processes where temperature sensitivity is critical.

overViewDescription: VBCC's Chemical Vapor Deposition (CVD) Furnace at 1200°C is an advanced thermal processing solution, meticulously designed for precise deposition of thin films and coatings. This state-of-the-art furnace operates on the principle of chemical vapor deposition, enabling the controlled growth of materials on substrates with exceptional uniformity.

With a maximum operating temperature of 1200°C, this CVD furnace creates an optimal environment for a wide range of deposition processes, including the synthesis of semiconductor materials, protective coatings, and advanced thin films. The furnace's robust construction ensures durability and longevity, making it a reliable tool for research laboratories and industries engaged in cutting-edge material science applications.

Equipped with sophisticated controls, the VBCC CVD Furnace provides users with the flexibility to tailor deposition parameters, ensuring reproducibility and precision in material synthesis. Whether utilized for academic research or industrial applications, VBCC's CVD Furnace at 1200°C stands as a testament to innovation, contributing to advancements in materials engineering, electronics, and nanotechnology.

overViewDescription: VBCC's Chemical Vapor Deposition (CVD) Furnace at 1400°C represents a pinnacle of thermal processing technology, specifically engineered for the controlled deposition of thin films and coatings with exceptional precision. The furnace's robust construction ensures longevity and reliability, making it a trusted tool in both research laboratories and industrial settings engaged in pioneering material science applications.

The VBCC CVD Furnace at 1400°C is equipped with sophisticated controls, empowering users to tailor deposition parameters for utmost precision and reproducibility. Whether applied in academic research or industrial processes, this furnace stands as a symbol of innovation, contributing significantly to advancements in materials engineering, electronics, and nanotechnology.

allProducts.description: Discover VBCC's range of Industrial and Research equipment. Our innovative, high-quality products are customizable to meet your specific needs, enhancing manufacturing and research capabilities.
overViewDescription: Dilatometer, A precision instrument for measuring thermal expansion with unparalleled accuracy. VBCC takes pride in offering a Dilatometer that sets the standard for precision and control, with features that make it an ideal choice for various industries.

Our Dilatometer boasts one-micron resolution thanks to LVDT technology, ensuring meticulous measurements. With a one-degree temperature accuracy, you can trust the results for your research and production needs. This Dilatometer is specifically tailored for tile, sanitary ware, and refractories industries.

What sets VBCC apart is our commitment to providing high-quality solutions at a fraction of the cost of imported alternatives. Our Dilatometer not only matches imports in performance but also delivers incredible value for your investment. It's built to last, with rugged durability, and our 24/7 service support ensures you're never left in the lurch.

For high-quality research and precise measurements, VBCC's Dilatometer is your trusted companion. Explore our range, including horizontal and vertical Dilatometers, as well as quenching Dilatometers, covering a temperature range from -RT to 1600°C.
